entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness early in the afternoon then 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 1 April 2023
